member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerAxis(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the specified controller axis along the X and Y axes.
member.returns: X and Y in the range of [-1;1] ([0;1] for a trigger).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerButtonPressed(int,AppVive::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is pressed.
member.param: A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerButtonTouched(int,AppVive::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is touched.
member.param: A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerPacketNum(int)
member.summary: Returns the number of the controller packet.
member.returns: Number of the controller packet.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.setControllerVibration(int,unsignedshort)
member.summary: Sets the vibration of the given duration and amplitude.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceAngularVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device angular velocity, in radians per second.
member.returns: Angular velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.isDeviceConnected(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device connected to the slot.
member.returns: true - connected; false - not connected.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceTransform(int)
member.summary: Returns a single pose for a tracked device.
member.returns: Identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceType(int)
member.summary: Returns the device type.
member.returns: Device type, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceVelocity(int)
member.summary: Returns a device velocity in tracker space, in meters per second.
member.returns: Velocity.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.setHeadPositionLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head position.
member.param: true to lock the head position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.isHeadPositionLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head position is locked.
member.returns: true if the head position is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.setHeadRotationLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head rotation.
member.param: true to lock the head rotation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.isHeadRotationLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head rotation is locked.
member.returns: true if the head rotation is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.isPoseValid(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device pose is valid.
member.returns: true - valid; false - invalid.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getTrackingResult(int)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating the tracking result: Uninitialized Calibrating in progress Calibrating out of range Running correctly Running out of range
member.returns: Tracking result.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getViewportMode const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating the current viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.returns: Current viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.setViewportMode(AppVive::VIEWPORT)
member.summary: Sets the viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.param: Viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getMaxTrackedDeviceCount const
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of tracked devices.
member.returns: The maximum value of tracked devices.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerStateAxisCount const
member.summary: Returns a number of axes.
member.returns: Number of axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceAxisType(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the value that identifies what type of axis is on the indicated controller.
member.returns: Axis of a corresponding type. One of the AXIS variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceManufacturerName(int)
member.summary: Returns the manufacturer name of the specified device.
member.returns: Manufacturer name.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getDeviceModelNumber(int)
member.summary: Returns the model of the specified device.
member.returns: Model.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.getControllerRole(int)
member.summary: Returns a specific role associated with a tracked device.
member.returns: Role associated with a tracked device. One of the CONTROLLER_ROLE variables.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.VIEWPORT_BLACK_SCREEN
member.summary: No image (black screen).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.VIEWPORT_MONO
member.summary: Mono image.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.VIEWPORT_STEREO
member.summary: Stereo image (left and right eye).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.DEVICE_INVALID
member.summary: A tracked device with an invalid index.

member.summary: A tracked head-mounted display.

member.summary: A tracked tracker device (Vive Tracker).

member.summary: A tracked camera and base stations that serve as tracking reference points.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.AXIS_NONE
member.summary: No axis is identified on the controller.

member.summary: An axis of a trackpad type.

member.summary: An axis of a joystick type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.AXIS_TRIGGER
member.summary: An axis of a trigger type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_SYSTEM
member.summary: The system button. These events are not visible to applications and are used internally to bring up the Steam Overlay or the Steam Client.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_APPLICATIONMENU
member.summary: The application menu button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_GRIP
member.summary: The grip button.

member.summary: The sensor panel up button.

member.summary: The sensor panel right button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_DPAD_DOWN
member.summary: The sensor panel down button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_A
member.summary: The button reserved for manual controllers.

member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_AXIS4
member.summary: The axis reserved for manual controllers.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TOUCHPAD
member.summary: The touchpad on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS0.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_STEAMVR_TRIGGER
member.summary: The trigger on the SteamVR controller. It is the same as BUTTON_AXIS1.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_DASHBOARD_BACK
member.summary: The back to dashboard button.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.BUTTON_MAX
member.summary: This is not an actual button. It just indicates the maximum number of buttons in the system.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_INVALID
member.summary: Invalid value for controller type.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_LEFT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the left hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_RIGHT_HAND
member.summary: Tracked device is associated with the right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_OPT_OUT
member.summary: Tracked device is opting out of left/right hand.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_TREADMILL
member.summary: Tracked device is a treadmill.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppVive.CONTROLLER_ROLE_MAX
member.summary: Indicates the maximum number of controller roles.
